column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I didn't expect the Art Institute to be as impressive as it was. I've been to several prestigious art museums around the world
column2: and the Art Institute of Chicago stands up to them
column3: if not EXCEEDS them. While museums like the Louvre certainly boast larger collections
column4: the Art Institute has so many renowned pieces. Also
column7: are so friendly and willing to guide you to your destination. Kind docents
column9: great collection. Check out the miniature rooms collection and the paper weights collection!! Of course
column10: don't forget the 18th-19th century European paintings. Truly full of gems!
